original_title: AI to be introduced to school curriculum
original_body_lines: COLOMBO(News 1st): Minister of Education Susil Premajayantha says that steps have been taken to add artificial intelligence to the IT subject in schools.
The Education Minister says this will be introduced to the grades of 06, 09, 10, and 13.
Minister Premajayantha says that as of now they are receiving sponsors from renowned international companies like Microsoft and future steps will be taken.
He also emphasized that over 5000 graduates will be recruited in the future.
122 million more people pushed into hunger since 2019, UN study finds
